mapper.insert: INSERT INTO daily (num, userId,nickName, categoryNum, subject, content, regDate, hitCount, notice) VALUES (daily_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userId},#{nickName},#{categoryNum}, #{subject}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) FROM daily d JOIN member m ON d.userId = m.userId

SELECT d.num, nickName, categoryNum, subject, TO_CHAR(d.regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')regDate, hitCount, NVL(replyCount,0) replyCount FROM daily d JOIN member m ON d.userId=m.userId JOIN dailyCategory t ON d.categoryNum = t.categoryNum LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT num, COUNT(*) rNum FROM dailyReply WHERE answer = 0 AND showReply=1 GROUP BY num )c ON d.num = c.num
ORDER BY num DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{size} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE daily SET hitCount = hitCount+1 WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select:
SELECT num, subject FROM daily d JOIN member m ON d.userId = m.userId
AND (num > #{num}) ORDER BY num ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT num, subject FROM daily d JOIN member m ON d.userId=m.userId
AND (num < #{num}) ORDER BY num DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
